name: js-data-express
description: Generate Express.js-compatible route middleware for JSData models.
author: js-data-express project authors

scripts.cover: nyc --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --cache mocha --recursive -t 20000 -R dot && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run cover
scripts.release: npm test && npm run doc && repo-tools updates && repo-tools changelog && repo-tools authors
